markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Crawl](/Actions.aspx?ID=76) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 470 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements** You are prone and your Speed is at least 10 feet.

</column>

---

You move 5 feet by crawling and continue to stay prone.
name: Crawl
requirement: You are prone and your Speed is at least 10 feet.
requirement_markdown: You are prone and your Speed is at least 10 feet.
